faq.q1: What is meant by royalty-free rights?
faq.a1: It means you can use the content without paying recurring fees.
faq.q2: Can I access the course after my subscription ends?
faq.a2: Yes, if you purchased it, it remains yours for life.
faq.q3: Are there certificates after completing the course?
faq.a3: Yes, you receive a completion certificate after finishing the course.
faq.a4: Yes, you can download them and watch offline.
faq.q5: Are the courses up to date?
faq.a5: Yes, the content is updated regularly.
faq.a6: Yes, we have a support team available 24/7.
faq.a7: We accept card payments, PayPal, and Apple Pay.
faq.a8: Yes, there is a 30-day money-back guarantee.
